availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Jordan (Major in 57th Indiana infantry)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, soldier. Major in the 57th Indiana Infantry from October 18, 1861, to November 20, 1862. Captain in the 12th Regiment, U.S. Veteran Reserve Corps from June 1864 to November 1864. Transferred to 13th Regiment, U.S. Veteran Reserve Corps on November 25, 1864. Brevetted to lieutenant colonel on March 13, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Asbury L. Kerwood, Annals of the Fifty-Seventh Regiment Indiana Volunteers: Marches, Battles, And Incidents of Army Life (Dayton: O. W. J. Shuey, 1868), 326. _Field Record of Officers of the Veteran Reserve Corps, from the Commencement to the Close of the Rebellion (Washington, D.C.: Scrivner & Swing, 1865), 9.
